== Main Inclusion Report for git-core ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/g/git-core, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:'' Revision control system for our kernel.
# ''Security:''
** One yet unfixed vulnerability (CVE-2006-0477)
** Addressed with 1.1.3-1ubuntu1 upload.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Source code review: (not done)
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** No showstopper Debian bugs, the single open one might not affect us.
** Good maintenance in Debian.
** Active upstream.
** Suggested to pull the latest Upstream Version.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
 0. Packaging
** Pretty ugly 'close-to-the-metal' packaging, but manageable.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.

=== Reviewers ===
MartinPitt: defered until security issue is fixed.
FabioMassimoDiNitto: addressed security (1.1.3-1ubuntu1), would be nice new upstream version. Approved.
